name: DearS (7)
summary: Just when the turmoil surrounding a childlike DearS called "IO" had started to calm down, Miu, whose feelings for Takeya are starting to increase, cannot stand that she called him "master". Meanwhile, DearS Headquarters have cut off contact with the outside world...
